data.title: NanoXplore successfully completes a private placement, raising $25,728,840 through a bought deal.
data.description: In a recent report, it was revealed that the unemployment rate in the country has dropped to 4.8%, marking a significant decrease from the previous rate of 5.3%. The report also highlighted that the economy added 250,000 new jobs in the last month, surpassing expectations. Additionally, the average hourly wage saw a 3.2% increase, indicating positive growth in the labor market. These figures indicate a positive trend in the economy and provide hope for continued recovery from the impact of the recent downturn.

data.title: Ubigi's eSIM for Travel offers stress-free holiday travel by staying connected. Recommended for vacation tech gifts.
data.description: In Paris, the recommendation is to select the best connectivity technology gift for holiday trips or vacations to ensure staying connected during the next getaway. This essential travel tech is crucial for seamless connectivity while traveling.

data.title: Moleculin to discuss Phase 3 AML trial at 14th Annual Acute Leukemia Meeting in Madrid; held on October 30-31, 2025.
data.description: On October 30, 2025, Moleculin Biotech, Inc. (Nasdaq: MBRX), a pharmaceutical company focusing on challenging cancers and viral infections, revealed plans to participate in the 14th Annual Acute Leukemia Meeting taking place on October 30-31, 2025 at the MD Anderson Cancer Center Spain Foundation in Madrid, Spain. This event signifies the company's dedication to innovative drug development in addressing critical medical issues.
US Energy Secretary Wright: The US is prepared to sell more oil and natural gas to China - Sources

data.title: Dow futures decline after Fed rate cuts and Trump-Xi meeting. S&P 500 and Nasdaq swing. Amazon and Apple earnings in focus. Fed likely to cut interest rates in December. Treasury bond yields: 10yr at 4.07%, 2yr at 3.59%. Alphabet stock soars post strong Q3 results.
data.description: US stock futures fluctuated on Thursday following mixed moves. The meeting between President Trump and President Xi Jinping resulted in reduced US fentanyl tariffs in exchange for increased soybean imports from China, a deal on rare earths, and positive indications for a broader trade deal. However, Fed Chair Powell's cautionary speech weighed on stocks as he hinted another rate cut isn't certain. The 10-year Treasury bond yielded 4.07% and the two-year bond stood at 3.59%. FedWatch projected a 70.4% likelihood of a rate cut in December. Futures changes were Dow Jones -0.19%, S&P 500 0.03%, Nasdaq 100 0.06%, and Russell 2000 0.36%. SPY and QQQ tracking ETFs were mixed in premarket. Alphabet Inc. soared 7.57% after beating Q3 estimates with $102.35B revenue and $2.87 EPS.

data.title: Trillions expected to transfer from Silent Generation & Baby Boomers to younger generations, survey reveals generational wealth transfer expectations & estate planning preparedness gaps. 60% under 59 expect inheritance, 64% over 60 plan to pass wealth. 21% over 60 do not plan to pass down, 94% not working with financial advisor.
data.description: The Great Wealth Transfer is set to move trillions of dollars from the Silent Generation and Baby Boomers to younger generations, prompting a need for better inheritance planning. MDRT surveyed 2,000 U.S. consumers across generations to understand readiness for this shift. 60% of consumers under 59 expect inheritance, while 64% of those above 60 plan to pass down wealth. Notably, 21% of older consumers don't plan to transfer wealth, with 94% not utilizing a financial advisor. This highlights generational differences in estate planning preparedness and the need for financial advice in navigating wealth transfers.

data.title: Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ: META) beats Q3 earnings estimates with $1.05 EPS (adjusted $7.25 EPS) and $51.24 billion revenue, surpassing $49.38 billion estimate and increasing by 26.25% from last year.
data.description: Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ: META) released positive third-quarter earnings on Wednesday. The company reported diluted earnings per share of $1.05, reflecting a one-time, non-cash income tax charge of $15.93 billion. This figure may not align with the estimated $6.68. Adjusted earnings per share stood at $7.25. Quarterly revenue reached $51.24 billion, surpassing the estimated $49.38 billion and marking a 26.25% increase from last year's $40.58 billion. The company expressed satisfaction with their performance during the quarter. For more details, visit Benzinga.com.

data.title: Stride stock (NYSE: LRN) dropped over 50% due to weak forecast, falling below Cakra formation on Oct 27. Analysis hints at challenges ahead.
data.description: Shares of Stride (NYSE: LRN) tumbled by more than 50% in a single day after a disappointing financial forecast pointing towards a slowdown in growth. Applying the principles of Adhishthana analysis, it becomes evident why the stock took a nosedive and what could potentially occur next. Adhishthana Principles suggest that stocks usually exhibit a Cakra structure between Phases 4-8, resembling a channel pattern with an upward trend, signaling positive market prospects. A significant breakout in Phase 9 commences the Himalayan Formation, indicating a strong upward momentum. In the case of Stride, the company initiated its Cakra formation in June 2024, maintaining a stable trajectory within the expected parameters initially. However, on October 27, upon entering Phase 6, the stock unexpectedly breached below the Cakra, indicating the commencement of the Move of Pralaya as per the framework. data.title: SETA S.p.A in Italy installs Conduent DOT1 ticket vending machine, the first of its kind.
data.description: A company in Italy, SETA S.p.A., has become the first to install the new Conduent DOT1 Next-Generation Ticket Vending Machine in Milan and Florham Park, N.J.

data.title: HanesBrands to report Q3 fiscal 2025 results on Nov 6, 2025. Acquisition by Gildan Activewear Inc. announced. No conference call.
data.description: HanesBrands Inc. (NYSE: HBI) has shared its intention to disclose the financial outcomes for the third quarter of fiscal 2025 on Thursday, November 6, 2025, prior to the market opening through a press release. Due to the impending procurement of HanesBrands Inc. by Gildan Activewear Inc. in August 2025, no conference call will be conducted. The press release can be accessed in the Investors segment of the HanesBrands corporate website at www.hanes.com/investo.

data.title: 32nd Annual PCF Scientific Retreat showcased latest advancements in prostate cancer research in Carlsbad, California.
data.description: Los Angeles – The Prostate Cancer Foundation (PCF) recently marked significant advancements and creativity in combatting prostate cancer during its 32nd Annual PCF Scientific Retreat from October 23-25, 2025 in Carlsbad, California. The event, known as the leading global gathering focused on prostate cancer biology and treatment, showcases a wide array of groundbreaking topics and attracts a diverse group of top-notch scientists annually. This year’s retreat was especially noteworthy for featuring cutting-edge research and solutions to address the disease.

data.title: Akari Therapeutics appoints leading medical oncologist Sara A. Hurvitz, MD, FACP to Scientific Advisory Board.
data.description: Renowned oncology specialist Dr. Hurvitz is a global expert in the field of oncology, known for her leadership in clinical research. With vast experience in conducting clinical trials across all phases, she has proven to be a valuable asset in advancing oncological research and treatment protocols.

data.title: Bioceres Crop Solutions will host a financial results conference call on Nov 13, 2025 at 8:30 am Eastern Time.
data.description: Bioceres Crop Solutions Corp. (NASDAQ: BIOX) will host a conference call on Thursday, November 13, 2025, at 8:30 a.m. ET to review its performance for the fiscal first quarter ending on September 30, 2025. Bioceres, a renowned company specializing in productivity solutions for agriculture that enhance crop resilience to climate change, aims to regenerate agricultural ecosystems. The press release disclosing the fiscal results is anticipated alongside the conference call, providing stakeholders with key insights.

data.title: Ecolab's Watermark Study uncovers how AI impacts global water stewardship, connecting to new business opportunities.
data.description: In St. Paul, Minnesota, Ecolab, a leading global company focusing on water solutions, unveiled insights from its third annual Ecolab Watermark™ Study, shedding light on global water management practices. The study emphasizes the association between water management and current global issues, such as the potential business prospects emerging from the expanding artificial intelligence (AI) sector and increasing consumer apprehension regarding its effects on essential natural reserves. data.title: Sakuu shows battery with dry cathode retains 83% charge after 4000 cycles, a breakthrough for longevity.
data.description: In San Jose, California, Sakuu®, a prominent supplier of commercial-scale machinery for battery and supercapacitor manufacturing sectors, has unveiled new data regarding the remarkable cycle life durability of battery electrodes made using the Sakuu Kavian® Manufacturing Platform featuring a fully dry processed cathode. The Kavian platform facilitates top-notch, tailored, large-scale, and affordable dry electrode printing, offering solutions that address fundamental challenges in the industry. This technology provides superior performance and longevity compared to current methods.

data.title: Qlik released Multivariate Time Series in Qlik Predict for better forecasting in Qlik Cloud using GPU acceleration.
data.description: In Philadelphia, Qlik has officially launched the Multivariate Time Series feature in Qlik Predict, now accessible in Qlik Cloud. This update introduces GPU-accelerated forecasting capabilities that are explainable to users.

data.title: Bank of Botetourt's Q3 net income: $2.88M ($1.40/share), up from $1.97M ($0.94/share) in the previous year. Assets totaled $898.8M.
data.description: Buchanan-based Bank of Botetourt released unaudited financial results for Q3 of 2025. They reported a net income of $2.88 million, up from $1.96 million in the same period last year. For the nine months ended September 30, 2025, the bank had a net income of $8.09 million, compared to $5.98 million in the previous year. Total assets grew to $898.81 million, with total net loans at $727.89 million and total deposits at $778.87 million. The bank's return on average assets was 1.23% and return on equity was 12.48%. They paid a 7.00% preferred dividend and a $0.225 per common share quarterly dividend. The Bank attributed the increase in net income to higher interest income and lower expenses. Their asset quality remained strong with the provision for credit losses standing at $326,000. The Bank qualified for the community bank leverage ratio framework with a ratio of 10.57%. Overall, the Bank of Botetourt continues to focus on delivering value to shareholders and serving the community.

data.title: Controversial Trump pardon for Binance CEO linked to $2B stablecoin deal facilitated by a high-level task force.
data.description: The recent controversial pardon of Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao by President Donald Trump has reportedly resulted in a significant rise in the market capitalization of the Trump family's cryptocurrency venture. A task force associated with Trump's crypto dealings had been established post Trump's election win to negotiate a deal with the family's emerging cryptocurrency venture, World Liberty Financial. The formation of this deal was aimed at securing a pardon for Zhao. Prior to the launch of World Liberty's dollar-pegged cryptocurrency, USD1, Binance allocated more than a dozen engineers to develop the underlying technology. Following this, Binance orchestrated a transaction where an Emirati state investor purchased a minority stake in Binance for $2 billion, with the payment made in USD1. This transaction significantly boosted World Liberty's market capitalization and expanded its operations. The detailed account can be accessed on Benzinga.com.

data.title: Seven Hills Realty Trust plans to conduct a fully backstopped rights offering to raise up to $65 million, expanding its lending platform.
data.description: Seven Hills Realty Trust, based in Newton, Massachusetts, has revealed plans to hold a rights offering to generate up to $65 million in gross proceeds. This move aims to secure further funding to enhance SEVN's lending platform, capitalize on favorable investment prospects, diversify its portfolio, and boost the liquidity of its common shares. SEVN intends to conduct a fully backstopped rights offering, with the goal of expanding its operations and strengthening its position in the market.

data.title: Holley Performance Brands showcase strong momentum and product innovation at SEMA 2025, solidifying aftermarket leadership.
data.description: Holley’s impressive portfolio of renowned brands continues to solidify its leading position in the aftermarket industry and provide a wide range of performance solutions for fans globally. This diverse portfolio includes a significant number of iconic names synonymous with high-quality automotive products, showcasing Holley's dedication to meeting the needs of enthusiasts around the world.
